process.description: TCP4-2338 Check pdf generator and send email sequentially with google places control
process.name: TCP4-2338 Check pdf generator and send email sequentially with google places control
process.bpmn:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<bpmn:definitions xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:bpmn="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:di="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:pm="http://processmaker.com/BPMN/2.0/Schema.xsd" xmlns:tns="http://sourceforge.net/bpmn/definitions/_1530553328908" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn" exporter="ProcessMaker Modeler" exporterVersion="1.0" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL http://bpmn.sourceforge.net/schemas/BPMN20.xsd">
  <bpmn:process id="ProcessId" name="ProcessName" isExecutable="true">
    <bpmn:startEvent id="node_3" name="Start Event 2" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:config="{"web_entry":null}">
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_11</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:startEvent>
    <bpmn:task id="node_7" name="Form Task" pm:screenRef="42" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_11</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_8</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_11" name="" sourceRef="node_3" targetRef="node_7"/>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="node_13" name="End Event">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_22</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:incoming>node_24</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:serviceTask id="node_1" name="PDF Generator 1" pm:config="{"screenRef":39,"fileName":"PDF-1"}" implementation="connector-pdf-print/processmaker-communication-pdf-print">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_10</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_14</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:serviceTask>
    <bpmn:serviceTask id="node_2" name="PDF Generator 2" pm:config="{"screenRef":41,"fileName":"PDF-2"}" implementation="connector-pdf-print/processmaker-communication-pdf-print">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_14</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_24</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:serviceTask>
    <bpmn:parallelGateway id="node_5" name="Parallel Gateway" gatewayDirection="Diverging">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_8</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_10</bpmn:outgoing>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_18</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:parallelGateway>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_8" name="" sourceRef="node_7" targetRef="node_5"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_10" name="" sourceRef="node_5" targetRef="node_1"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_14" name="" sourceRef="node_1" targetRef="node_2"/>
    <bpmn:serviceTask id="node_15" name="Send Email 1" pm:config="{"emailServer":"","type":"text","subject":"Test case email 1","textBody":"{{_request.id}}\nTest case email 1.","screenRef":null,"users":[],"groups":[],"addEmails":["pablo.barroso@processmaker.com"],"requestRecipients":[],"usersAndGroupsOptionSelected":false,"attachments":[]}" implementation="connector-send-email/processmaker-communication-email-send">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_18</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_20</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:serviceTask>
    <bpmn:serviceTask id="node_16" name="Send Email 2" pm:config="{"emailServer":"","type":"screen","subject":"Test case email 2","textBody":"","screenRef":40,"users":[],"groups":[],"addEmails":["pablo.barroso@processmaker.com"],"requestRecipients":[],"usersAndGroupsOptionSelected":false,"attachments":[]}" implementation="connector-send-email/processmaker-communication-email-send">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_20</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_22</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:serviceTask>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_18" name="" sourceRef="node_5" targetRef="node_15"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_20" name="" sourceRef="node_15" targetRef="node_16"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_22" name="" sourceRef="node_16" targetRef="node_13"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_24" name="" sourceRef="node_2" targetRef="node_13"/>
  </bpmn:process>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagramId">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlaneId" bpmnElement="ProcessId">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_3_di" bpmnElement="node_3">
        <dc:Bounds x="300" y="160" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_7_di" bpmnElement="node_7">
        <dc:Bounds x="260" y="230" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_11_di" bpmnElement="node_11">
        <di:waypoint x="318" y="178"/>
        <di:waypoint x="318" y="268"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_13_di" bpmnElement="node_13">
        <dc:Bounds x="290" y="600" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_1_di" bpmnElement="node_1">
        <dc:Bounds x="390" y="380" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_2_di" bpmnElement="node_2">
        <dc:Bounds x="390" y="490" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_5_di" bpmnElement="node_5">
        <dc:Bounds x="300" y="340" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_8_di" bpmnElement="node_8">
        <di:waypoint x="318" y="268"/>
        <di:waypoint x="318" y="358"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_10_di" bpmnElement="node_10">
        <di:waypoint x="318" y="358"/>
        <di:waypoint x="448" y="418"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_14_di" bpmnElement="node_14">
        <di:waypoint x="448" y="418"/>
        <di:waypoint x="448" y="528"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_15_di" bpmnElement="node_15">
        <dc:Bounds x="120" y="380" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_16_di" bpmnElement="node_16">
        <dc:Bounds x="120" y="490" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_18_di" bpmnElement="node_18">
        <di:waypoint x="318" y="358"/>
        <di:waypoint x="178" y="418"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_20_di" bpmnElement="node_20">
        <di:waypoint x="178" y="418"/>
        <di:waypoint x="178" y="528"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_22_di" bpmnElement="node_22">
        <di:waypoint x="178" y="528"/>
        <di:waypoint x="308" y="618"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_24_di" bpmnElement="node_24">
        <di:waypoint x="448" y="528"/>
        <di:waypoint x="308" y="618"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
    </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
  </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
</bpmn:definitions>
